attributes.action: Rename the street the Russian Embassy is on in London to Free Ukraine Gardens
attributes.additional_details: Renaming the street will force the Russian Embassy to include Free Ukraine as part of their address.  This will be a constant reminder of the true state of Ukraine and continual source of embarassment re their unjustified invasion of Ukraine.
attributes.background: Rename Kendington Palace Gardens to Free Ukraine Gardens

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
